project.name: instrument
project.description: Problem: - There is an instrument that measures the value in time. It produces (time,value) pairs. The instrument should produces recorded values, it should not been implemented properly. - We would like to get notifications about certain events such as: a) value less / more than x b) change of the value is more than x. c) area below the value measured is bigger than x d) etc. [end of thinking capacity] - Patterns should be used: Observer, Chain of Responsibility.
